name: 新流星搜劍錄
description: " Master of Meteor Blades " is a cold weapon battle game built by Titans studio, is the "meteor butterfly sword. Net" authentic sequel, the game is used of the original Chinese martial arts cold weapon rub tactics play , this game at the E3 exhibition, won the "best game creative play" award.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP(SP2&SP3）/Windows7（32bit&64bit)/Win8 Processor: Intel E5300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP(SP2&SP3）/Windows7（32bit&64bit)/Win8 Processor: Intel i5-3470 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX650 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space
